name: Gravity - Demo
description:
leftclick - shoot a wall to change the gravity

rightclick - manipulate an object which is affected by gravity

space - jump

shift - sprint

hold e - pickup objects

Currently there is only one puzzle and one test room in which there is no goal to be achieved. Here you can only experiment with the game mechanics. New levels are already under development.

In the first level you must first pick up the Gravity Apple and charge your weapon with it. Then you will have the power to influence gravity and thus move smaller objects like the battery in the first level.
